signup.redirection: Once you have completed and submitted the form, you will be redirected to the website of GoCardless, our payment provider, in order to proceed with the subscription by SEPA mandate. Your subscription will transit through the bank account of our payment provider: therefore, it is their bank details that will appear as the creditor on your bank statement.
